author: m.kalinin
content: Note that depending on node's configuration unsafe may turn into safe with the next received block which is roughly 12 seconds. This is for the case if a regular node isn't subscribed to attestation aggregates subnet to reduce its bandwidth (aggregates are mandatory for validators, not for regular nodes) and receives attestations to a block within the child of this block. Nothing substantial but just to clarify, so, I'd say 12 seconds in general case, 8 seconds in a specific case when node is subscribed to attestation aggregates overlay

author: sky.cactus
content:
I disagree with this pretty strongly:
> 12 vs 16 seconds is an eternity when it comes to UX
1 vs 4 is seconds is an eternity.  100 vs 104 is unnoticeable.  12 vs 16 is noticeable if you are paying close attention.  PoS vs PoW drowns this out entirely, so we still are getting a huge benefit either way.
